idea-plugin.name: Robotlegs
idea-plugin.description:
<html> <dl> <dt>Adds a Robotlegs tool window to let you explore the mappings in your project.</dt>
<dt>Use CTRL + SHIFT + G to jump to a mapped class (from view->mediator, event->command, etc) </dt>
<dt>File issues here: https://github.com/johnlindquist/open-source-plugins/issues </dt> </dl> </html>
idea-plugin.change-notes: <html> <dl> <dt>0.3 Added switching between mapped classes with ctrl+shift+G (think "Go to mapped class"). Next steps: I need to clean up the code base before taking it any further, then start work on code generation.</dt> <dt>0.2 Fixed bugs from real-world user-testing (handling conditionals, multiple args, etc) </dt> <dt>0.1 Initial Beta Release: Browse your project for mapped classes and inject a class with right-click.</dt> </dl> </html>

action.description: Toggle to a Class mapped in a Context
